titles.title: To amend the National Organ Transplant Act to prevent the sale of bone marrow and umbilical cord blood, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Organ and tissue donation and transplantation

bill.summary: 12/20/2012--Introduced. Amends the National Organ Transplant Act to prohibit acquiring, receiving, or otherwise transferring a cord blood unit (the neonatal blood collected from the placenta and umbilical cord of a single newborn baby) for valuable consideration for use in human transplantation if the transfer affects interstate commerce.
